column4: hi. I upgraded to Meerkat this morning. and the system freezes for a second or two. The CPU graph stays still. mouse pointer doesn't move. nothing happens. but it gets back to normal after 2-3 seconds. what could be wrong?
haven't checked. let me see. 1 moment.
psmouse.c: GlidePoint at isa0060/serio2/input0 lost synchronization, throwing 1 bytes away. I can see this
hm, let's paste to paste.ubuntu.com website, the whole content of dmesg and I will look through also ?
I did not remove the recommended to be removed packages. but chose to keep them.
what is this hesitation you notice?  only on startup or is it more frequently
frequent. happens now. even when i type.
did it happen when booting livecd of the same distro?
yeah, try a livecd of whichever you're running now to check for that hesitation
oh come on! don't tell me to re install.
